code: 解説見た&誤読してた

import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8 as B
import Data.List
import Data.Maybe

bsReadInts = map (fst . fromJust . B.readInt) . B.words

solve :: Int -> [Int] -> String
solve n as = if solve2 (zip [1..] as) then "Yes" else "No"

solve2 nas = all isGood $ unfoldr getPart nas

getPart :: [(Int,Int)] -> Maybe ([(Int,Int)], [(Int,Int)])
getPart = f . dropWhile (uncurry (==))
  where
    f [] = Nothing
    f (na:nas) = Just (na : nas1, nas2)
      where
        (nas1, nas2) = splitAt (2*len) nas
        len = length $ takeWhile prop $ binzip nas

prop ((n0,a0), (n1,a1)) = n0 == a0 && n1 /= a1

binzip = unfoldr f
  where f (x:y:p) = Just ((x,y), p)
        f _       = Nothing

isGood [_] = False
isGood nas = ordpres left && ordpres right
  where
    left =  [a | (n,a) <- nas, n < a]
    right = [a | (n,a) <- nas, n > a]

ordpres x = all (uncurry (<)) $ zip x (tail x)

main = do
  cont <- B.getContents
  let n : as = bsReadInts cont
  putStrLn $ solve n as

{-
This answer was written after referring to the editorial.
-}

import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8 as B
import Data.List
import Data.Maybe

bsReadInts = map (fst . fromJust . B.readInt) . B.words

solve :: Int -> [Int] -> String
solve n as = if solve2 (zip [1..] as) then "Yes" else "No"

solve2 nas = all isGood $ unfoldr getPart nas

getPart :: [(Int,Int)] -> Maybe (([(Int,Int)], Int), [(Int,Int)])
getPart = f . dropWhile (uncurry (==))
  where
    f [] = Nothing
    f (na:nas) = Just ((na : nas1, len), nas2)
      where
        (nas1, nas2) = splitAt (2*len) nas
        len = length $ takeWhile prop $ binzip nas

prop ((n0,a0), (n1,a1)) = n0 == a0 && n1 /= a1

binzip = unfoldr f
  where f (x:y:p) = Just ((x,y), p)
        f _       = Nothing

isGood ([_], _) = False
isGood (nas, len) = ordpres left && ordpres right && all rangeOK nas
  where
    left =  [a | (n,a) <- nas, n < a]
    right = [a | (n,a) <- nas, n > a]
    rangeOK (_,a) = xmin <= a && a <= xmax
    xmin = snd (nas !! 1) - 1
    xmax = xmin + 2 * len

ordpres x = all (uncurry (<)) $ zip x (tail x)

main = do
  cont <- B.getContents
  let n : as = bsReadInts cont
  putStrLn $ solve n as
No

def fail!
    puts 'No'
    exit
end

N = gets.to_i
ps = [0] + N.times.map{gets.to_i}
INF = 10**9

same = (0..N).map{|i| ps[i] == i}

blocks = []
pool = []
(1..N).each do |i|
    if same[i]
        if same[i-1] && pool.length > 0
            blocks.push(pool)
            pool = []
        end
    else
        if i > 1 && !same[i-1]
            unless i >= 4 && same[i-2] && !same[i-3]
                fail!
            end
            if pool.length > 0
                blocks.push(pool)
                pool = []
            end
        end
        pool.push(i)
    end
end
blocks.push(pool) if pool.length > 0

blocks.each do |bl|
    l, r = 0, 0
    bl.each do |i|
        if ps[i] < i
            fail! if l > ps[i]
            l = ps[i]
        else
            fail! if r > ps[i]
            r = ps[i]
        end
    end
end
puts 'Yes'

N = gets.to_i
ps = [0] + N.times.map{gets.to_i}
same = Array.new(N+1)

blocks = []
b = []
(1..N).each do |i|
    same[i] = (ps[i] == i)
    if same[i]
        if same[i-1] && b.length > 0
            blocks.push(b)
            b = []
        end
    else
        if i > 1 && !same[i-1] && !same[i-2]
            puts 'No'
            exit
        end
        if !same[i-1] && b.length > 0
            blocks.push(b)
            b = []
        end
        b.push(i)
    end
end
blocks.push(b) if b.length > 0

blocks.each do |b|
    l, r = b.minmax
    l2, r2 = b.map{|i| ps[i]}.minmax
    if l != l2 || r != r2
        puts 'No'
        exit
    end

    b.length.times do |i|
        if ps[b[i]] == l
            l += 2
            b[i] = nil
        end
    end
    (b.length-1).downto(0) do |i|
        if b[i] && ps[b[i]] == r
            r -= 2
        end
    end
    if l - r != 2
        puts 'No'
        exit
    end
end

puts 'Yes'

x=$<.map &:to_i
n=x[0]
h={}
begin
    i=1;while i<=n
    raise if (x[i]^i)%2>0
    u=x[i];v=i;h[u]=1
    while i<u
        i+=1
        raise if x[i]!=i
        i+=1
        raise if (x[i]^i)%2>0
        if u<x[i];u=x[i];h[u]=1
        elsif v==x[i];v+=2;v+=2 while h[v]
        else;raise
        end
    end
    i+=1;end
    puts :Yes
rescue
    puts :No
end

def fail!
    puts 'No'
    exit
end

N = gets.to_i
ps = [0] + N.times.map{gets.to_i}
INF = 10**9

same = (0..N).map{|i| ps[i] == i}

blocks = []
pool = []
(1..N).each do |i|
    if same[i]
        if same[i-1] && pool.length > 0
            blocks.push(pool)
            pool = []
        end
    else
        if i > 1 && !same[i-1]
            unless i >= 4 && same[i-2] && !same[i-3]
                fail!
            end
            if pool.length > 0
                blocks.push(pool)
                pool = []
            end
        end
        pool.push(i)
    end
end
blocks.push(pool) if pool.length > 0

blocks.each do |bl|
    arr = []
    l, r = nil, nil
    min, max = INF, -INF
    bl.each do |e|
        arr.push(e)
        l ||= e
        r = e
        min = ps[e] if min > ps[e]
        max = ps[e] if max < ps[e]
        if min==l && max==r
            arr.length.times do |i|
                if ps[arr[i]] == l
                    l += 2
                    arr[i] = nil
                end
            end
            (arr.length-1).downto(0) do |i|
                if arr[i] && ps[arr[i]] == r
                    r -= 2
                end
            end
            if l - r != 2
                fail!
            end
            arr = []
            l, r = nil, nil
            min, max = INF, -INF
        end
    end
    fail! if arr.length > 0
end
puts 'Yes'

require 'pp'
# IS_DEBUG = true
IS_DEBUG = false
def dputs str
	if(IS_DEBUG)
		puts str
	end
end
def dpp str
	if(IS_DEBUG)
		pp str
	end
end

require 'pp'

N,_=gets.chomp.split(' ').map{|n| n.to_i}
A = Array.new(N)
0.upto(N-1){|d|
	A[d],_=gets.chomp.split(' ').map{|n| n.to_i}
}

mode = :NONE
start_i = nil
start_v_final = nil
start_v = nil
for i in 0..(N-1)
	v = A[i]
	v_final = i+1
	dputs "searching A[#{i}], #{A[i]}"
	case mode
	when :NONE
		dputs "NONE"
		if(v==v_final)
			next
		elsif(v==v_final+2)
			mode = :LEFT	# 3 5 7 9 1
			start_i = i
			start_v_final = v_final
			next
		elsif((v-v_final)%2==0)
			mode = :RIGHT	# 9 1 3 5 7
			start_i = i
			start_v = v
			next
		else
			puts "No"
			exit(0)
		end
	else
		dputs "mode = #{mode}"
		if((i-start_i) % 2 != 0)
			if(v==v_final)
				dputs "pivot ok"
				next
			else
				dputs "pivot NG"
				puts "No"
				exit(0)
			end
		else
			case mode
			when :LEFT
				if(v==v_final+2)
					dputs "LEFT ascendings ok"
					next
				elsif(v==start_v_final)
					dputs "LEFT terminate ok"
					# terminate
					mode = :NONE
				else
					puts "No"
					exit(0)
				end
			when  :RIGHT
				if(v==v_final-2)
					dputs "RIGHT ascendings ok"
					next
				elsif(start_v==v_final)
					dputs "RIGHT terminate ok"
					# terminate
					mode = :NONE
				end
			end
		end
	end
end
puts "Yes"

# IS_DEBUG = true
IS_DEBUG = false

require 'pp'

N,_=gets.chomp.split(' ').map{|n| n.to_i}
A = Array.new(N)
0.upto(N-1){|d|
	A[d],_=gets.chomp.split(' ').map{|n| n.to_i}
}

mode = :NONE
start_i = nil
# v_final and v when start section
start_v_final = nil
start_v = nil
# the last value of left forward
left_v = nil
# the last values of right forward
right_v = nil
for i in 0..(N-1)
	v = A[i]
	v_final = i+1
	dputs "searching A[#{i}], #{A[i]}"
	case mode
	when :NONE
		dputs "NONE"
		if(v==v_final)
			next
		elsif((v-v_final)%2==0)
			mode = :STARTED
			# 3 5 7 9 1
			# 5 7 9 1 3
			# 9 1 3 5 7
			right_v = v
			left_v = nil
			start_i = i
			start_v_final = v_final
			next
		else
			puts "No"
			exit(0)
		end
	else
		dputs "mode = #{mode}"
		if((i-start_i) % 2 != 0)
			if(v==v_final)
				dputs "pivot ok"
				next
			else
				dputs "pivot NG"
				puts "No"
				exit(0)
			end
		else
			if(mode == :STARTED)
				if(v < v_final)
					if(left_v.nil? || left_v < v)
						left_v = v
						if(right_v == v_final)
							mode = :NONE
						end
						next
					else
						puts "No"
						exit(0)
					end
				elsif(v > v_final)
					if(right_v < v)
						right_v = v
						next
					else
						puts "No"
						exit(0)
					end
				else
					puts "No"
					exit(0)
				end
			end
		end
	end
end
puts "Yes"

h={}
begin
    (1..n).map{|i|

    while i<u
        i+=1

        if u<x[i];u=x[i];h[u]=1
        elsif v==x[i];v+=2;v+=2 while h[v]

    end
    }
    puts :Yes
rescue
    puts :No
end

ps = [0] + N.times.map{gets.to_i}
INF = 10**9

same = (0..N).map{|i| ps[i] == i}

blocks = []
pool = []
(1..N).each do |i|
    if same[i]
        if same[i-1] && pool.length > 0
            blocks.push(pool)
            pool = []
        end
    else
        if i > 1 && !same[i-1]
            unless i >= 4 && same[i-2] && !same[i-3]
                fail!
            end
            if pool.length > 0
                blocks.push(pool)
                pool = []
            end
        end
        pool.push(i)
    end
end
blocks.push(pool) if pool.length > 0

blocks.each do |bl|
    mini, maxi = bl.minmax
    minp, maxp = bl.map{|i| ps[i]}.minmax
    fail! unless mini == minp && maxi == maxp

    l, r = 0, 0
    bl.each do |i|
        if ps[i] < i
            fail! if l > ps[i]
            l = ps[i]
        else
            fail! if r > ps[i]
            r = ps[i]
        end
    end
end

<?php

function input_and_explode() {
    return explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
}

$N = input_and_explode()[0];

$sortable = true;

for ($i = 0; $i < $N; $i++) {
    $p = input_and_explode()[0];
    if ($p % 2 === 1 && $i % 2 === 1 || $p % 2 === 0 && $i % 2 === 0) {
        $sortable = false;
        break;
    }
}

echo $sortable ? "Yes\n" : "No\n";

<?php

function input_and_explode() {
    return explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
}

$N = input_and_explode()[0];

for ($i = 0; $i < $N; $i++) {
    $p[] = input_and_explode();
}

for ($j = 0; $j < $N - 2; $j++) {
    for ($k = 0; $k < $N - 2 - $j; $k++) {
        if ($p[$k] > $p[$k + 1] && $p[$k + 1] > $p[$k + 2]) {
            list($p[$k], $p[$k + 2]) = [$p[$k + 2], $p[$k]];
        }
    }
}

$sorted = true;

for ($i = 0; $i < $N - 1; $i++) {
    if ($p[$i] > $p[$i + 1]) {
        $sorted = false;
        break;
    }
}

echo $sorted ? "Yes\n" : "No\n";

<?php

$input = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
$n = (int)$input[0];
$args = [];
while(true){
	$input = explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
	foreach ($input as $value) {
		if ($value !== '') {
			$args[] = (int)$value;
		}
		if (count($args) >= $n) {
			break;
		}
	}
	if (count($args) >= $n) {
		break;
	}
}

$length = count($args);
$idx = 0;
$cur_pos = 1;
while($idx < $length){
	$tmp = $args[$idx];
	if ($tmp == $cur_pos) {
		++$idx;
		++$cur_pos;
		continue;
	}
	if ($tmp < $cur_pos) {
		echo "No";
		exit(0);
	}
	// 判定開始
	$target_key = (int)array_search($cur_pos, $args);
	if ($idx + 1 == $target_key) {
		echo "No";
		exit(0);
	}else{
		$flg = false;
		for ($i=$idx+1; $i < $target_key; $i++) { 
			if ($args[$i] > $args[$target_key] && $args[$i] < $tmp) {
				$args[$idx] = $args[$target_key];
				$args[$target_key] = $tmp;
				$flg = true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if ($flg == false) {
			echo "No";
			exit(0);
		}
	}
	++$idx;
	++$cur_pos;
}
echo "Yes";

<?php

function input_and_explode() {
    return explode(' ', trim(fgets(STDIN)));
}

$N = input_and_explode()[0];

for ($i = 0; $i < $N; $i++) {
    $p[] = input_and_explode();
}

for ($j = 0; $j < $N - 2; $j++) {
    $changed = false;
    for ($k = 0; $k < $N - 2 - $j; $k++) {
        if ($p[$k] > $p[$k + 1] && $p[$k + 1] > $p[$k + 2]) {
            list($p[$k], $p[$k + 2]) = [$p[$k + 2], $p[$k]];
            $changed = true;
        }
    }
    if (!$changed) {
        break;
    }
}

$sorted = true;

for ($i = 0; $i < $N - 1; $i++) {
    if ($p[$i] > $p[$i + 1]) {
        $sorted = false;
        break;
    }
}

echo $sorted ? "Yes\n" : "No\n";

N = int(input())
ret = "Yes"
isOdd = 1
for __ in range(N):
  if int(input)%2 != isOdd
  	ret = "No"
  isOdd = 1 - isOdd
print(ret)

def getReverseNum(nums):
    if len(nums) <= 1:
        return nums, 0
    if len(nums) == 2:
        return ([nums[1], nums[0]], 1) if nums[0] > nums[1] else (nums, 0)

    leftNum, left = getReverseNum(nums[:len(nums) // 2])
    rightNum, right = getReverseNum(nums[len(nums) // 2:])

    #print(leftNum, left, "left")
    #print(rightNum, right, "right")
    res = left + right
    resNum = []
    leftP, rightP = 0, 0
    while leftP < len(leftNum) and rightP < len(rightNum):
        if leftNum[leftP] < rightNum[rightP]:
            resNum.append(leftNum[leftP])
            leftP += 1
            res += rightP
        else:
            resNum.append(rightNum[rightP])
            rightP += 1
            #res += (rightP + 1)
        #print(resNum[-1], res)

    resNum += leftNum[leftP:] if leftP < len(leftNum) else []
    res += len(rightNum) * (len(leftNum) - leftP) if leftP < len(leftNum) else 0
    resNum += rightNum[rightP:] if rightP < len(rightNum) else []
    return resNum, res

if __name__ == "__main__":
    N = int(raw_input())
    nums = []
    for i in range(N):
        nums.append(int(raw_input()))

    _, reverseNum = getReverseNum(nums)
    #print(reverseNum)
    if reverseNum % 3 == 0:
        print("Yes")
    else:

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline
N = int(input())
p = [int(input()) for _ in range(N)]
p_tmp = [i for i in p]
swap_idx = []
i = 0
while i < N:
    if p_tmp[i] == i + 1:
        i += 1
        continue
    found = False
    for j in range(i + 2, N, 2):
        if p_tmp[j] == i + 1:
            found = True
            break
    if not found:
        print('No')
        sys.exit(0)
    # checkいるかも？
    # swap
    tmp = p_tmp[j]
    for k in range(j, i+1, -2):
        p_tmp[k] = p_tmp[k - 2]
    p_tmp[i] = tmp
    for k in range(i, j):
        if p_tmp[k] != k + 1:
            print('No')
            sys.exit(0)
    i = j
print('Yes')

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline
N = int(input())
p = [int(input()) for _ in range(N)]
p_tmp = [i for i in p]
swap_idx = []
i = 0
while i < N:
    if p_tmp[i] == i + 1:
        i += 1
        continue
    found = False
    for j in range(i + 2, N, 2):
        if p_tmp[j] == i + 1:
            found = True
            break
    if not found:
        print('No')
        sys.exit(0)
    # checkいるかも？
    # swap
    tmp = p_tmp[j]
    for k in range(j, i, -2):
        p_tmp[k] = p_tmp[k - 2]
    p_tmp[i] = tmp
    for k in range(i+1, j, 2):
        if p_tmp[k] != k + 1:
            print('No')
            sys.exit(0)
    i += 2
print('Yes')

import sys

N=int(input())
p=[int(input()) for i in range(N)]

s=list(range(1,N+1))

i=1
while i<N:
    x=p.index(i)

    #print(x)

    
    if i==x+1:
        i+=1
        continue
    elif x<i-1:
        break

    
    if (x-i+1)%2!=0:
        
        break

    #print(s,i,x)

    for j in range(i-1,x,2):
        s[j],s[j+2]=s[j+2],s[j]
        i=x+2
    #print(s,i)

if s==p:
    print("Yes")
    sys.exit()

#print(s)

s=list(range(1,N+1))
i=N
while i>0:
    x=p.index(i)
    if i==x+1:
        i-=1
        continue
    elif x>i-1:
        break

    
    if (x-i-1)%2!=0:
        
        break

    #print(s,i,x)

    for j in range(i-1,x,-2):
        s[j],s[j-2]=s[j-2],s[j]
        i=x
    #print(s,i)

if s==p:
    print("Yes")
    sys.exit()

else:
    print("No")

b.sort()

for B,C in zip(b,c):
    if B > C:
        print("No")
        exit(0)

print("Yes")

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline
N = int(input())
p = [int(input()) for _ in range(N)]
p_tmp = [i for i in p]
swap_idx = []
i = 0
while i < N:
    if p_tmp[i] == i + 1:
        i += 1
        continue
    found = False
    for j in range(i + 2, N, 2):
        if p_tmp[j] == i + 1:
            found = True
            break
    if not found:
        print('No')
        sys.exit(0)
    # checkいるかも？
    # swap
    tmp = p_tmp[j]
    for k in range(j, i, -2):
        p_tmp[k] = p_tmp[k - 2]
    p_tmp[i] = tmp
    for k in range(i, j):
        if p_tmp[k] != k + 1:
            print('No')
            sys.exit(0)
    i = j-1
print('Yes')
